title: MT5 to Python Bridge
prompt: Create a technical diagram showing the connection between MetaTrader 5 and Python. Left side: MT5 terminal window icon with Finex broker logo, showing candlestick chart preview. Center: A bridge or connector element with bidirectional arrows, labeled 'MetaTrader5 Python API'. Right side: Python logo with code snippet preview showing 'mt5.symbol_info_tick()'. Include data flow labels: 'Tick Data', 'OHLCV', 'Account Info', 'Trade Orders' flowing in both directions. Below, show connection parameters: 'Login', 'Password', 'Server'. Dark slate background (#1E293B) with blue (#3B82F6) and yellow (#EAB308 - Python yellow) accents. Clean professional API documentation style.
negative_prompt: cartoon style, 3D renders, complex shadows, too detailed screenshots, cluttered
